thread.title: Colson Montgomery drives in five as White Sox overtake Rays
thread.title_full: Colson Montgomery drives in five as White Sox overtake Rays

author: Field Level Media
title: Colson Montgomery drives in five as White Sox overtake Rays
text:
Rookie Colson Montgomery hit a three-run homer and a go-ahead, two-run double, helping the Chicago White Sox rally for an 11-9 win against the host Tampa Bay Rays on Wednesday.
Reliever Jordan Leasure (3-5) tossed a scoreless seventh for the White Sox, who took two of three in the series and have won five of six.
